relevant_findings.skin: Pale skin and visible mucous membranes. Several small, rounded aphthous ulcers on the lips and buccal mucosa, grayish-white settling with erythematous crown.
relevant_findings.nodes: Nodes up to 6 cm in diameter on both shins, hyperemic, painful, with necrosis and bleeding.
relevant_findings.peripheral_edema: Observed in the shin and on the dorsal surface of the right foot.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: From April 10, there was a significant deterioration in the patient's condition with an increased number of painful erythematous nodes bilaterally, ulceration and bleeding from nodes.
